title: President isn’t ‘Mary Sue’ - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Bickering Couple   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Cute Story   Modern Day   Office Romance   Salaryman   Tsundere
author: He Han   河汉
description: When Ruan Yan gets a new job, he expected the president the be tall, rich and handsome, but most importantly, ‘Mary Sue’. However, the plot doesn’t quite turn out the way he expected…>
